sentence.Network_en: The song of the oyster, though not silenced , was diminuendo amore.
sentence.Network_cn: 牡蛎之歌, 虽然还未沉寂,已渐唱渐弱.

sentence.Network_en: The song of the oyster, though not silenced , was diminuendo con amore.
sentence.Network_cn: 牡蛎之歌虽未沉寂, 但已渐唱渐弱.

sentence.Network_en: Repeat starting pianissimo and making a crescendo to forte and then a diminuendo.
sentence.Network_cn: 重复长音练习,弱进渐强至强音然后渐弱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 音乐术语_百度百科 ... 逐渐消失（ Smorzando） 渐弱（diminuendo）( Diminuendo/dim) 最弱( Piano Pianissmo/ppp).
diminishingly 逐渐减小地diminuendo 渐弱演奏diminution 减少
diminuant〔法〕渐弱的。diminuendo〔意〕渐弱。diminuendo molto〔意〕大幅度地渐弱。参见crescendo molto.
accelerando 渐快的diminuendo 渐弱，音量渐小smorz 渐消失的

list.abs: ...più animato〔意〕更活跃，更快。参见animato.piu diminuendo〔意〕更加渐弱。più forte〔意〕更强。
Crescendo e diminuendo　先渐强后渐弱 Crescendo poi diminuendo 先渐强后渐弱Crescendo poco a poco sin al fine 渐渐加强至结尾为止

derivation.yuyuan_name: Italian, literally diminishing, from diminuire, from Latin deminuere 'lessen' (see diminish)

auth_sentence.content: As such, the orchestra should rather be playing diminuendo.
auth_sentence.res_content: As such, the orchestra should rather be playing diminuendo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: As such, the orchestra should rather be playing diminuendo.

auth_sentence.content: The words apply just as well to Walser himself, whose life and work played out as a relentless diminuendo.
auth_sentence.res_content: The words apply just as well to Walser himself, whose life and work played out as a relentless diminuendo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The words apply just as well to Walser himself, whose life and work played out as a relentless diminuendo.

auth_sentence.content: They played a specially commissioned piece and then Ellington called for an older number, Diminuendo and Crescendo in Blue.
auth_sentence.res_content: They played a specially commissioned piece and then Ellington called for an older number, Diminuendo and Crescendo in Blue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They played a specially commissioned piece and then Ellington called for an older number, Diminuendo and Crescendo in Blue.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"音乐术语"; 2. 表名词,"人,物或状态"
